name: INSpeakableString
desc: A custom phrase to be resolved by an Intents extension.

items.name: init(spokenPhrase: String)
items.desc: Initializes the string with the specified phrase.

items.name: init(vocabularyIdentifier: String, spokenPhrase: String, pronunciationHint: String?)
items.desc: Initializes the string with a phrase from your app's vocabulary.
